subject: [junit] Re: junit
msgSnippet: ... I d rather have it test itself. ;-) public class MyTestCase extends TestCase { public static void main(String[] args) {
messageBody:
> It is common to write main() in each Test Case class like this.
>
> public class MyTestCase extends TestCase {
> // ... tests ...
> public static void main(String[] args) {
> junit.textui.TestRunner.main(args);
> }
> }

I'd rather have it test itself. ;-)

public class MyTestCase extends TestCase {
public static void main(String[] args) {
junit.swingui.TestRunner.run(MyTestCase.class);
}
}

--
Shinobu Kawai <shinobu@...>
